thread.title: The internet reacts to the Bowling Green Massacre
thread.title_full: The internet reacts to the Bowling Green Massacre

author: Lizzy Acker | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: The internet reacts to the Bowling Green Massacre
text: On Thursday, Kellyanne Conway, a senior adviser to President Donald Trump, cited the fictional "Bowling Green Massacre" to defend Trump's executive order on banning visitors from seven Muslim-majority countries.On Thursday, Kellyanne Conway, a senior adviser to President Donald Trump, cited the "Bowling Green Massacre" to defend Trump's executive order on banning visitors from seven Muslim-majority countries.
